website_summaries.verdict: Asus has built a very nice sideline over the years with its gaming laptops, including the G74SX, which is a strong, if expensive, quad-core rig that works fine, but looks like it should cost less.
pros: The Asus G74SX packs gamer-friendly components into an understated case, and includes a large 160GB SSD and plenty of RAM
cons: It's very expensive, while some parts still feel cheap, and higher-end boutique laptops beat it on performance

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as 5 year old Alienware Laptop
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking machine and very light. First thing I wanted to get rid of was the all red back lit keyboard. You can't so you better like red. Next was the slow 2,2 mghz cpu that you can't turbo. I updated the bios (easy) but no provision to over clock or turbo. Speakers are very weak. Had to crank the volume up to 90% to hear at normal volume. Works well with headphones, however I don't wear them that often. Over all I wasn't impressed considering that my 5 year old Alienware Laptop is as good if not better. Returned to Amazon the next day .
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: will not stay online
customer_reviews.text: The computer has a nice solid feel and appearance. It seems to work well but not as fast as anticipated. I am not a gamer so do not know that part. Have only had a week but will probably send back. It just will not acquire a wifi signal and when gets a signal it will not stay connected. Very disappointed. From the description I thought it would be faster. Glad I am not trying to use it for games.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Defected item
customer_reviews.text: Not happy, and very inconvenient, item worked for one day, following day item was dead. Went through the trouble of having to return Item, It was received by seller July 1st. 2020 and I’m still sitting here waiting for a refund...not happy at all.
customer_reviews.author: teddyb

customer_reviews.title: The computer is perfect, that's all
customer_reviews.text: The product is awesome!! I'm extremely happy with it, I had some troubles with ups but the service from Amazon is perfect and they solved all my problems easily and quickly
customer_reviews.author: Alfonso

customer_reviews.title: Good all around laptop
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my son, and he is very pleased with the all around abilities of the laptop. He wanted this one for its speed and storage, and it works fairly well on games, too. Very pleased with the purchase. Very pleased with the delivery time, and packing as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Fields

customer_reviews.title: BLAZING FAST Desktop Replacement
customer_reviews.text: I love this laptop. It's big in size but it's got 3Gb RAM on the video card so it needs the extra fans in the rear. Still haven't had a chance to check out the 3D abilities of it, but will do so soon. 16Gb DDR3 RAM - Awesome 3Gb RAM on the Video Card - Awesome 2.2Ghz Core i7 - Awesome 160Gb SSD - Awesome 750Gb Secondary HDD - Awesome Comes with a great backpack for carrying. All around an AWESOME laptop.
customer_reviews.author: macncheese

customer_reviews.title: Wrong graphics card installed
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand why but my laptop came with an Intel UHD 630 graphics card instead of the NVIDIA GeForce 1060. Super annoyed!
customer_reviews.author: Trent

customer_reviews.title: My SON loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My son is a computer guru and a game nut. He picked this computer out for his birthday present. He loves his computer!
customer_reviews.author: Maryjayne M Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Fast speed laptop for gaming
customer_reviews.text: A very fast laptop for game and surf online. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Whoyodady

customer_reviews.title: Great Laptop
customer_reviews.text: The laptop has been outstanding. I don't use it for gaming...I use it for video and photo editing. The speed with which this machine churns through data is very fast. The screen is also amazing. I highly recommend this laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Dash

customer_reviews.title: It has everithing I ever wanted in a Laptop
customer_reviews.text: I used to hate laptops, because they usually feel slow if they were compared with a similar price desktop. ASUS G74SX-A2 is diferent: It overcomes a similar price desktop in almost every aspect, and it can do it in every place. It's a little heavy but I feel happy of carrying in everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Álex Julián

product_meta.title: New ASUS TUF Gaming Flagship FX705GM 17.3" FHD IPS Display Laptop, Latest Intel 6-Core i7-8750H up to 4.1GHz, 16GB RAM, 512GB PCI-e SSD+2TB HDD, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, Backlit Keyboard, Windows 10
product_meta.description:
ASUS TUF Gaming FX705GM Laptop: Give your PC adventures a boost with this ASUS gaming laptop. Its Intel Core i7 processor and 16GB of DDR4 RAM let you immerse yourself in lag-free play, and the NVIDIA GeForce GTX graphics card renders stunning visuals on the 17.3-inch HD display. This ASUS gaming laptop boasts a 512GB SSD+2TB HDD for fast boot times and an RGB backlit keyboard.

Windows 10 operating system

17.3" Full HD display
The 1920 x 1080 resolution boasts impressive color and clarity. IPS technology for wide viewing angles. Energy-efficient LED backlight.

8th Gen Intel® Core™ i7-8750H mobile processor
Powerful 6-core, twelve-way processing performance. Intel Turbo Boost Technology delivers dynamic extra power when you need it, while increasing energy efficiency when you don't.

16GB DDR4 system memory for intense multitasking and gaming, 2 Memory Slots

512GB PCI-e Solid State Drive (PCI-e)+ 2TB HDD

NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 graphics
Backed by 3GB GDDR5 dedicated video memory for a fast, advanced GPU to fuel your games.

Weighs 5.73 lbs. and measures 1.1" thin

4-cell lithium-polymer battery.

HDMI output expands your viewing options

Built-in media reader for simple photo transfer, Supports SD and MultiMediaCard memory card formats.

Next-generation wireless connectivity
Connect to a Wireless-AC router for speed nearly 3x faster than Wireless-N. The Gigabit Ethernet LAN port also plugs into wired networks.

Built-in HD webcam with microphone

Backlit keyboard

Headphone/microphone combo jack.

Note: This laptop does not include a built-in DVD/CD drive.

AMAZON.COM

17.3" FHD display 1920 x 1080 resolution boasts impressive color and clarity.IPS technology for wide viewing angles. Energy-efficient LED backlight.NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 graphics 3GB GDDR5 dedicated
